content: round you have to make folding sts the same way as r8 but with hdcs and 1 double_crochet in the corner join into r13 in front of the chain with a standing half_double_crochet in last st before any first fltr *fhdc in next 6 sts work over next 3 sts and in the same marked back loop fhdc fdc fhdc fhdc in next 6 sts work in front of the chain half_double_crochet in next 2 sts r13 work behind the chain half_double_crochet in next 2 sts r13 twice work in front of the chain half_double_crochet in next st work behind the chain half_double_crochet in next st work in front of the chain half_double_crochet in next st work behind the chain half_double_crochet in next 2 sts work in front of the chain half_double_crochet in next 2 sts twice* repeat *to* 3 more times omit last half_double_crochet join to standing half_double_crochet with a sl-st do not fasten_off stitch count per repeat 19 half_double_crochet 14 fhdc 1 corner fdc 7 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved 16 corners are not symmetrical chain 1 and single_crochet in the same st single_crochet in next 7 sts *in next st the fdc 2 single_crochet chain 2 1 single_crochet single_crochet in next 33 sts * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last 8 single_crochet join to first single_crochet fasten_off but weave ends in after next round stitch count per repeat 36 single_crochet 1 chain-2 space 17 a3/h2 join with a standing bpdc around last st before any chain-2 space *in chain-2 space 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet bpdc around next 36 sts * repeat *to* 3 more times omit last bpdc join to standing bpdc fasten_off and secure ends stitch count per repeat 4 double_crochet 36 bpdc 1 chain-2 space last thing to do is to give your square a slight block thank you for choosing my pattern love ineke 8 original design by ineke mooijenkind copyright © 2019 all rights reserved
